context.arch.discoverer.query
Class ClassifierWrapper

java.lang.Object
  context.arch.discoverer.query.ClassifierWrapper

public class ClassifierWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Adapter class to wrap a Weka Classifier to work with the Context Toolkit. This class deals with formatting the classifier and sending/retrieving its information from the Discoverer network. Note that this supports only classification (to nominal strings), not regression.

Nested Class Summary
static class ClassifierWrapper.LRUCache<K,V>
          Use LRU (Least Recently Used cache; instead of FIFO) map storage of classification result of instances.

isInstanceExtractable

protected boolean isInstanceExtractable(ComponentDescription widgetState)
Checks if widget state can be extracted as an appropriate Instance, since other widgets are also queried. If this fails, then classification would fail and return null.

Parameters:
widgetState -
Returns:
